bioconda.name: bioconductor-weaver
bioconda.summary: Tools and extensions for processing Sweave documents

biotools.summary:
This package provides enhancements on the Sweave() function in the base package. The focus
of the extensions is on caching computationally expensive (time consuming) code chunks in Sweave
documents.

bioschemas.name: weaver
bioschemas.summary:
This package provides enhancements on the Sweave() function in the base package. The focus
of the extensions is on caching computationally expensive (time consuming) code chunks in Sweave
